attributes.action: consider the potential consequences of the proposition to allow police to stop and question anyone in the UK under new anti-terror laws on communities within the UK and scrap the proposals as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent proposal to give Police the right to stop and question anyone will only serve to alienate whole communities within the UK, stimulating the sense of injustice already prevalent in certain communities.  As a result, these proposals are likely to increase radicalism and therefore fuel the problem it is designed to restrict.  We urge you to think again and scrap these plans.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
